node.text:
The splendidly luxurious Favourite Ayurveda Centre at The Raviz Kovalam has a Green Leaf Certification, with specialists in authentic Marma massage techniques. We even have a private garden with medicinal herbs for our oils, packs & medicines. 
For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
